name: Remain Nameless
text: Ward.... you were a little hard on the Beaver. The worst place in Oxford is on the south side of Hwy 78 East. The BEST place is A&B and they are located on the north side of 78 just east of Hutch Touch. I'm in retail sales in the trailer industry myself and A & B Trailers is my go to source for information, parts, and trailers. If  I have a question about ANYTHING in regards to dragging a wagon... A&B Trailers.. Knowledge level? I'll put it this way; theres not anything they can't  cover on your trailer.  I promise, they will never lead you wrong. These guys are not pencil pushers that have sit behind a desk all of their lives. They are blue collar, hard working, hands on, highly experienced fabricators and they know their stuff. If you want to spend half of your retirement on junk just to have it fall apart in a few months, then go across the street and shop with Ward. Now if you want an extremely well built, solid piece of equipment at a reasonable price  from an excellent company that stands behind their product AND appreciates their customers?... Welcome home family!! You are in the right place. A&B Trailers. You won't find better people anywhere and let me just add this in there.... these cats are Perfectionists. I know. I have worked side by side with them in a fab shop and I am a perfectionist also, but these jokers....well they take it to a whole nother other level. I will take an oath to say, "They do things at A&B with a whole bunch of heart and a truck load of pride. It's done once, done right, and that's the product they will provide you every single time. I highly recommend A&B Trailers for all of your parts, accessories,  tires, wheels, batteries, or even if you are looking to upgrade with a brand new piece of pride attached to your vehicle.. Come on down to A&B. I'm sure glad I stopped here. Received a solid product and made two friends for life. Where else can you get service like that? A&B Trailers. Ask for Andy or Barney. NO need in referencing my review. They'll know who sent ya when you call them by their names 🤣

name: Bradley McCurry
text:
We ordered 10 trailers from them and paid them over $8k as a deposit.  They won't answer calls and keep promising delivery in text messages but they never come.  They were supposed to be done in 3-4 weeks.  It has now been 6 months.  We have demanded a refund or delivery and have even sent someone to their shop.  They are dishonest and not to be trusted.   I will update this review if we get our money back or the trailers are delivered.  Does anyone know an attorney in Madison County?

8-24-20 UPDATE - We still have not received our order despite repeated promises they would be delivered in whole and/or in part depending on which week your are talking about.  We are filing a BBB complaint and will file suit against them if that doesn't resolve it.  We have put them on notice of this and are doing everything possible to resolve this without taking that step.

9-8-20 UPDATE - We still have not received our order.  The last promise made was they were going to deliver a load on Sunday 8/30 (not our entire order but enough to cover our deposit).  Since we paid by wire transfer we have now filed a complaint with the FTC as well which was suggested by the BBB.

They are literally impossible to communicate with and whenever I do speak to them “something has came up” on a time or day to meet. Seriously starting to think it’s a sort of scam or such. do your research and read the other reviews! I’m not the only one.” from my boss Mr. Wong. He asked me to post this because he’s not too tech savvy.

resp.text: I don't have anything in the computer under your name...give me your name that the item is under under and I will get it rested asap.

name: jon k
text: Excellent work and attention to detail.

name: Andrea Wiley-Bigelow
text:
We ordered a grill I’m December of 2018.  Because my husband is on the road a lot, we were promised the grill would be ready the end of Feb.  we left a deposit and received a receipt for balance due once the grill was finished.  My husband was on the road so I went by late Feb to check on the status and it was barely started.  Hubby came home around Mid April and we went to check on it and again, not ready. Was promised we would have it time for Memorial Day Grilling. While my husband was on the road, he called frequently as did I.  Not only did we never get anyone to answer but no return calls.  Needless to say, it wasn’t ready for Memorial Day nor 4th of July.  Because they would never answer the phone nor return calls, I went to the business several times to check on the grill and each time only a few workers were there and not the owners and each time the grill looked like a totally different grill.  My guess is they were building and selling it to other customers because they knew my husband was on the road.  Each time my husband came back home, he checked on the grill and because it would not be ready, the owner would throw in extra things. We finally put our foot down and told the owner that we didn’t want the grill and he wanted our deposit back.  Miraculously the grill was completed with a quick paint job and they delivered it.  The owner also charged us several hundred dollars more for things we didn’t ask for and we didn’t get things that were promised on the contract.  We have not used this grill yet as it was also promised that they would come o
Pick it up and install the additional rack and other item and we are still waiting.  I would not recommend this business or conduct business with Rogers Welding ever again!

resp.text: I am sorry that you aren't satisfied. We offered your husband his money back but he declined. We will be more than happy to refund your money. You can return the grill at your earliest convenience. We delivered the grill at no cost to you. In fact the grill you received was not the one you initially ordered. The one you received retails for $1200.  We upgraded because we couldn't find the small size water heater tank to use. (You ordered a 80 gallon tank you received a 150 gallon tank.) The one you ordered would have been a water tank heater which can not support double racks. Again, we do apologize and we would be more than happy to refund you. Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review. If you need to drop off the grill after hours, we will be more than happy to make arrangements. Have a great evening!

name: Bill Parks
text:

I work for a local HVAC company and have needed them to build many stands, a few roof curb adapters and have used their welding services on job sites.
I would absolutely recommend this company for your welding needs.

Bill Parks
Conditioned Air Solutions

text:
Great trailer. I got a 16 ft hybrid. The problem is the axels where off causing my tires to go bald in a matter of 2 months. I thought
we’ll go thing I have a warranty. They have not called me back, email or returned any money back to me. The worst customer service. They are impossible to get a hold of.

name: Amy Carkhuff
text:
Be prepared to be ripped off!

We ordered a dump trailer on February 9, 2020. We originally paid a deposited of $3,100 via square trade. The owners wife Tiffany contacted us On February 14 saying the transaction did not process properly. She then asked us to pay the deposits via PayPal friends and family. We verified that the first payment was returned so we went ahead and complied with her new request.

The company changes the date the trailer would be available for pick up 6 times. My husband explained that we had purchased cabinets via an online auction and we needed the trailer in a timely fashion. They said they would refund us the deposits. We were told on multiple occasions the deposits was “in the mail”. Fast forward....it’s been over two months and we still have not received our deposits back. When we try to reach out they do not return our calls.

Because we paid via PayPal friends and family PayPal will not refund the deposit.  This company was unreliable, dishonest, and took $3,100 from us. If I could give 0 stars I would.

name: Benny Jones
text: I have two trailer's built by Roger's Welding, one was a special order. David and Tiffany were great to work with and build a great trailer my rating is A +++

text: Bought a 7x16 dovetail trailer from SLE equipment that was manufactured by Roger's didn't even have it 3 months wheels started going balled took it to trailer shop bent axle. They put a bent axle on my trailer and refuse to fix it even though it has a warranty on it. Never return phones poor customer service. NEVER BUY FROM THEM

resp.text: I am so sorry you aren't satisfied. Have you been calling the right number...(256) 334-1113? When could you get it back to our shop? Each axle.is built to order. They are delivered to us brand new. Before we place an axle on a trailer, we inspect it ourselves to make sure they do not have any issues. Axles are bent when a trailer has been overloaded. Would you like to set up a time to bring the trailer on to be evaluated?

resp.text: I am so sorry that you are not happy. I would be gladly to repaint your trailer for you. Please call the office at your earliest convenience. Thanks and have a great day!

name: Maria McSherry
text:
The sales experience was great! No complaints.

My garage kept, babied ATV with less than 22 hours on it started experiencing issues in May 2020. After researching the issue in case it was a simple fix, I requested a service appointment, and after several days I finally received a call stating they were behind. Fast forward to now almost 2.5 months later and every time I call to schedule the service, I’m told is that service department is behind, and they’ll get to me. That is too long for a service appointment. It makes me question how good the products really are...What good is the extended warranty if you can’t use it? My ATV is basically new and I can’t ride it. I will never purchase a Polaris product again.

resp.text: Sorry for the unusual experience.  We understand the frustrations of vehicle down-time, and work hard to shorten the time it takes to get your vehicle repaired when it does have issues.  We did have you scheduled for an appointment to bring your vehicle to us on May 18th and when you did not show we attempted to contact you to reschedule.  Since we did not hear from you we assumed the issues with your ATV were no longer a problem.  If your ATV still needs service, please contact us and we will be happy to get you back on the schedule for the next available appointment.

text: Great Service. Got a new rzr they had us in and out within a hour. Wonderful people.

resp.text: Thanks Nickolas!  We appreciate your business!

name: Angie Porterfield
text:
If you are looking for an off road vehicle (atv, side by side) this is the first place to look. There was no pressure to buy today. Only the desire to listen so that could find the right machine for our needs and not the most expensive thing on the lot. Our salesman Spencer and the rest of the knowledgeable staff was able to answer every question that we had. The Staff also treated my wife with the respect that lacks in other dealer experiences . We left that day feeling like we have gotten a great deal and amazed at how friendly and respectful the staff is. We cannot say enough great things about the buying experience through Champion Powersports. The parts department has also been very knowledgeable and courteous while helping with parts and accessories for our ATV. The Polaris 570 utility edition that we purchased could not have been a better choice for our needs. This ATV has no trouble pulling the 950 pound trail mower we use on the farm or putting that smile on your face at the end of a hard days work . The 570 has more than enough power for the tough jobs or excitement out on the trail. The best way to describe the Polaris 570 utility edition and Champion Powersports is simple. The right tool for the job. Thank you to everyone at Champion for what you do.
Matthew Porterfield

name: Bradley Owens
text:
Robert and Brink are my go-to guys. Even though, Xtreme Offroad Ind. LLC (me) and Champion Powersports are competitors in our profession, every time I need to refill my supply shelf with Polaris specific maintenance items, or need to order specialty parts, I go see them. Usually you'll never hear of another powersport repair shop praising competition, but again these guys help me when I need it most.

I sometimes order parts that are on back-order or out-of-stock, but Jeff and the parts guys can usually get me fixed up somehow by working some magic! I ordered a crankshaft that was 3 months out on back-order and somehow they got it in 2 weeks. That is true customer service!

Again, Jeff, Robert, Brink, I appreciate you guys and whenever I need more Polaris supplies you'll be where I go first!

text: My husband and I bought not just one but two little four wheelers for our kids,   I had been shopping g around d we got a fair price for them.  The reason for my one star, NO CUSTOMER SERVICE! At that point the parts were out of warranty.  So we paid for them and shipping.  We got the wrong parts.  I even took picture the second time.  We got parts that look similar but size was wrong, would not work.  So Mailed them back along w one of the brake pads off the 4 wheeler and tracked them..  I found out that the package was delivered Thursday 4/28 .  I called and was told spouse was sick bit she sent picture to manufacture.  No call that we got them, they are working on it,, nothing.  This has been the way we have been treated.  You have to chase them down to get answers.  I asked to be called by the end of the week, with answers and a solution!  I haven't been able to ride our 4 wheelers since early March!  It's May 2nd!  It's not like we got these for free and didn't pay for replacement parts or shipping!

text: After having my trailer for 2 weeks they managed to change one brake assembly. I picked up trailer today after them telling me it could be monday or so before they could finish it. Brought trailer home to install other brake assembly and brakes still not working. After I finally got brakes working correctly on the assmbly I installed, I removed hub that they installed on the same side on the rear tandem. When removing the hub I removed the hub nuts with my hand, they werent even tight. After removing hub and inspecting it noticed that the new seal they had installed was goulded and the spindle was also goulded. Have to replace seal again on the new one they just installed. Have had issues with brakes from the day i purchased trailer. I run hotshot loads and cant afford to be down as long as they had my trailer and still have to go behind them to replace stuff. I have replaced the seals on this trailer twice now and replaced 2 magnets on the brakes with no warranty applied. As for as purchasing trailer I could not ask for better service, but maintenance and offering warranty coverage for parts, there has not been any mention of it other than the brake assemblies.

name: Cathy Young
text: We drove 2.5 hours to purchase our beautiful, new Can Am Spyder RT Sea to Sky from this dealership and it was well worth it. From the very get go, Bree was amazing and straight forward.  We knew what we needed and wanted and she was able to give us it at a price that worked for us. Bree and the team here give: 1) true up front, out the door pricing, 2) a fair amount for trades, 3) no hassle financing and 4) great service all the way around. We appreciated the honesty she gave us from the get go knowing we had been working with another dealership. She never bad mouthed them or tried anything sneaky (can’t say the same for the Big #1) to win our business. She beat them in price and overall customer service. Casey, in finance, was able to get us a deal we could work with, warranties and services we needed and our financing approved quickly. When we arrived everything, to include our bike, was ready to go. When parts we were expecting were not immediately found, Tim, the General Manager, stepped in and started looking and found the part. From first phone call to driving away on our bike, it was a wonderful experience.

name: Thomas Stapp
text: I had been dealing with another dealership in AL but I could never get the salesman that I was assigned to on the phone. He was always busy but would text me and then not respond for hours at times. I started looking elsewhere and came across Motorcycle Sports and gave them a call and talked to Dwight and he had what I was looking for. Within a few hours Dwight and Kim had me ready to go. They held the unit for me until I could there. I made a 2.5 hr drive and Kim had all paperwork ready to go. Dwight showed me the unit and explained the features and I was ready to go. I also found out 2 days before heading out that a friends uncle has purchased a unit from here a few weekends prior and had a great experience. Dwight and Kim and a few other staff members told me a about a few local riding spots. I highly recommend this dealership and will go back when its time for another one.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Thomas!

name: V Z
text:
**SHADY EBAY SELLER**

This outfit does not honor binding pricing agreements. They cancelled my order because the selling price was apparently too low, only to turn around and relist the same part for much higher. They also took it a step further and FALSIFIED the reason for cancellation, stipulating that it was buyer's request (it was not). Further requests for explanation went ignored.

I can only imagine what goes on inside the business if the dishonesty pervades the online portal.

Consider yourself warned.
